title: A brief of proceedings between Sr. Hierom Sankey and Dr. VVilliam Petty with the state of the controversy between them tendered to all indifferent persons.
author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.
notes: Petty was employed to survey the forfeited estates in Ireland with a view to their distribution among the army. The work provoked animosities and jealousies, and the mouthpiece of the opposition to Petty was Sir Hierome Sankey, a military officer. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
